wiki.content:
"All Summer Long" is the title of a song recorded by Kid Rock. It was released in 2008 as the third single from his ninth studio album Rock N Roll Jesus. The song is based on Warren Zevon's "Werewolves of London" and Lynyrd Skynyrd's "Sweet Home Alabama". The idea for the mashup was suggested by Mike E. Clark. The song was a Number One hit in eight countries across Europe and Australia, including the UK, and has even crossed over to country music radio, giving Kid Rock his first Top Ten country hit. The song was the official theme song to WWE's pay-per view event, Backlash 2008.
 
 
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "All Summer Long" is the title of a song recorded by Kid Rock. It was released in 2008 as the third single from his ninth studio album Rock N Roll Jesus. The song is based on Warren Zevon's "Werewolves of London" and Lynyrd Skynyrd's "Sweet Home Alabama". The idea for the mashup was suggested by Mike E. Clark. The song was a Number One hit in eight countries across Europe and Australia, including the UK, and has even crossed over to country music radio, giving Kid Rock his first Top Ten country hit. The song was the official theme song to WWE's pay-per view event, Backlash 2008.

track.name: All Summer Long
comments: He rocks  and looks good doing..
Spank! Whooooo~! Take me back! Awwwwwwww~ Head Bob! Head Bob! All summer long! Sweet Home Alabama all summer long! Rocks! :-)
OMG! Spank! This is the best tune to take me back! I love this tune and talent! Whoooooooo! :-)
This song got stuck in my head at work the other day... for no reason. I hadn't heard it for about 3 years. lol
Such a beautiful masterpiece.....
TURN IT UP
kick ass
brings back some good memories
Love this one by him!!
I really shouldn't like this bastardisation of two true greats - but you know what? I love it! Sometimes you just have to swallow your pride.......
this is a hot song
Sweet Home Alabama all summer long!
A touchof warren zevons werewolves of london at the beginning. A great track
I think anyone that grew up in the 70's and 80's can relate to this song. Summer time when you where of highschool age.
a very cool tribute :))
IT'S THE SIMPLE THINGS IN LIFE LIKE WHEN AND WHERE...
kick ass song!!!
this song rocks
this is one of my favorite summer songs along with summer of '69 and im only 13!!!!!!
kid rock kicks ass!!!
